header.title: User Post Isolation
header.description: View all posts from a certain user in a topic.
header.author-notes: This file should be used only to update from version 1.0.0 to version 1.0.1. If you do not have 1.0.0 installed already, please install the latest version of this MOD by using the install.xml in the main directory of this MOD package. If this MOD has helped you, please consider donating by visiting http://www.phpbbdevelopers.net/board/lwdonate.php. All donations are voluntary and will be greatly appreciated.

changelog.change: Version 1.0.0 Released and Submitted to MOD DB
Still keeping it at version 1.0.0, Re-submitted to MOD DB
[fix] a couple of backend changes recommended by MOD Team
[fix] drop down box defaults to last chosen option
[feature] added "All users" option to select box to allow user to return to normal topic view.
[fix] undefined variable throwing an error when debug is on
[fix] only posts from first page shown in isolation

action-group.diy-instructions: After all edits have been performed, navigate to the ACP and purge the cache and refresh the template.
